page.title: 08ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: The most popular means of entertainment in Banchory-Devenick seems to be the{television. A local farmer attends{community {meetings}and watches certain T.V. programmes. The local joiner's wife said "{the occasional night out"}and another householder said " the {television, playing the piano and the {computer". An old man said that once a month he went to a{boxing club.}The school cleaner said{"telly and video"}and in days gone by "discos". Another man said "television" and that he used to enjoy a{concert or dance}in the past. Some are{golfers, some ride horses and one man{collects old British motor {bikes.}At Haremoss a model air-plane club meet to fly their{remote {controlled planes.
